duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive services and repairs as required, including road tests, inspections, and explaining diagnoses to non-mechanical individuals.
Maintain store cleanliness and equipment efficiency, adhere to safety policies, and provide on-the-job training for new team members.
Handle physical demands such as tire deliveries, tire services, oil changes, alignments, fluid services, brake services, and other miscellaneous tasks.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license and a minimum 2 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field, or demonstrated skills via third party certificates/assessment. ASE certification in at least one of A1-A8 is preferred.
